title: Invisible Touch
description: Beautiful, demanding, and ambitious, ER surgeon Ramsey Taylor has built a life based on hard work and determination. As the youngest chief resident in a busy world-class hospital, she has no time for relationships outside of medicine.But while attending a conference in Las Vegas, she meets Austin, a handsome and mysterious stranger, whose charms she can’t refuse. They share an intense, physical and emotional attraction that leaves her wanting the romance and whimsy she never allows herself. But an unusual turn of events leaves Ramsey questioning everything she ever knew—including the man who stole her heart.Ramsey’s well-ordered life has been set on a new and unpredictable path, far away from the world she knows.And there’s no going back.
author: Kali Rogers
